attributes.action: Do not extradite Julian Assange to the United States of America
attributes.additional_details: The UN have moved against the arbitrary detention of Assange and recommend his release, as well as compensation for his deprivation of liberty (February 2016).
attributes.background: Julian Assange is due to be extradited to the USA for publishing Wikileaks. This is setting a dangerous precedent for journalists who challenge the status quo, and limits freedom of speech against powerful elites and governments.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
